snippet: Patricia Ann Kettles, known as Miss Patty at the Staten Island library where she is the manager, did not finish reading her first book until she was in the fourth grade.
abstract: Profile of Patricia Ann Kettles, known as Miss Patty, who is manager at the Staten Island library; Kettles did not learn to read until she was in the fourth grade and shares story of her troubled childhood as way to illustrate how vital libraries are in face of New York City's budget cuts.
lead_paragraph: Patricia Ann Kettles, known as Miss Patty at the Staten Island library where she is the manager, did not finish reading her first book until she was in the fourth grade.

headline.main: Librarian’s Love of Books Began in Her Struggles to Read
headline.print_headline: Librarian’s Love of Books Began in Struggles to Read
